title: Anyone know Hebrew?
author: VD
content_html: Just want to verify something. When David killed Goliath, was “nakah” the term used? And was “ratsach” the one used to refer to Uriah’s murder?
content_text: Just want to verify something.  When David killed Goliath, was “nakah” the term used?  And was “ratsach” the one used to refer to Uriah’s murder?
